name: Krampus is Home
description:
This game is a very atmospheric experience which focuses on stealth mechanics and survival strategies, the enemies have been developed with advanced AI thus they are very unpredictable, there are jumpscares in this game.

KEY FEATURES

- First person shooter.

- Complex and challenging survival strategies.

- Cinematic visuals.

- Story-driven game play.

- Advanced AI.

- Jump scares.


FUTURE VERSIONS SHOULD HAVE

​- Continued story.

- New gameplay modes.

- Other languages.

- full gamepad support.
